column3: drake  damn another 0 missed calls i love her and i hate her it's a funny twist y'all can't stand her it when she in town but miss her when she gone truth be told i'd rather be with her than alone but fights break out and neighbors call 50 screamin you the most foul bitch i know forever mine wherever i go sex pistols out bang die slow nah die slower than that just collapse all over my mattressss who shot cha that nigga ain't finished so once again i find myself in it clickclack just let me take a minute round  is in the chamber all you gotta do is spin it aim for the heart battle of the sexes all's fair love and war casualties expected
